status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7iqr8","text":"To purify the CK2 kinase complex, subclone GST-TEV-CK2α together with CK2β in a pFastBac-Dual vector (available from Addgene) and GST-TEV-CK2α’ together with CK2β in a pFastBac-Dual vector (available from Addgene) for co-expression in insect cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj3ht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89pah","text":"Use the constructs to generate bacmid DNA, using the Bac-to-Bac system, by amplification in DH10BacY cells 25. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":106,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qfd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ei4o","text":"After the bacmid DNA was verified by PCR for insertion of the transgene, purify bacmid DNA for transfection into Sf9 insect cells (12659017, Thermo Fisher, RRID:CVCL_0549). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl26s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bjbs","text":"To this end, mix 2500 ng of plasmid DNA with FuGene transfection reagent (Promega) and transfected 1 million Sf9 cells seeded in a 6 well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkv4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vm4h","text":"About 7 days after transfection, harvest the V0 virus and use to infect   of 1 million cells per ml of Sf9 cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a13s9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5lo6q","text":"Closely monitor the viability of the cultures and upon the decrease in viability and confirmation of yellow fluorescence, collect the supernatant after centrifugation and stored this as V1 virus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k6a4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j4aj","text":"For expressions, infect   of Sf9 cells (12659017, Thermo Fisher, RRID:CVCL_0549), at 1 million cells per ml, with   of V1 virus for GST-TEV-CK2α/CK2β and   of V1 virus for GST-TEV-CK2α’/CK2β. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":154,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"nj9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hjio","text":"When the viability of the co-infected cells decreased to 90-95%, collect cells by centrifugation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d6ns","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bcdb0","text":"Wash the cell pellets with 1x PBS and flash-frozen in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbotb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8obhm","text":"Store pellets at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4da9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vj6c","text":"For purification of the CK2 kinase complex, resuspend pellet  in 25 ml lysis buffer 1 µl benzonase (Sigma), complete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche), CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmvc8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22sdq","text":" 25ml Lysis buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f73fj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12ruh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":[179,122],"data":[["Tris- HCl, pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["Glycerol","5%"],["Triton X- 100","1%"],["Benzonase","1µl"]],"guid":"F58C3959A43F451188C9384C086F30AA","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Tris- HCl, pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["Glycerol","5%"],["Triton X- 100","1%"],["Benzonase","1µl"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgh3k","text":"Homogenize and clear the cells with a douncer and lysates  by centrifugation at    in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4fdpd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1f53","text":"Collect and incubate the supernatant with pre-equilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind the CK2 complex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"54ar9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b84p","text":"Centrifuge samples to pellet the beads and remove the unbound lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1ldq","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer, once with high salt wash buffer, and two more times with wash buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2crqb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs4fp","text":"Wash buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f4gf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dfonl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4qj0","text":"Salt wash buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aii2j","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ckubq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":[135,71],"data":[["Tris-HCl, pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["Glycerol","5%"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"guid":"BD4AA05AA80145F08017C8FD6D3547EC","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Tris-HCl, pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["Glycerol","5%"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"rowHeights":[]}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":[127,80],"data":[["Tris-HCl, pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","700 mM"],["Glycerol","5%"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"guid":"5A624AC5F58242D7BE9C26EDCC31EC27","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Tris-HCl, pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","700 mM"],["Glycerol","5%"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sq84","text":"Wash the beads twice with   of wash buffer, and collect the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44ac9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
